message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about different sources of energy. Option (B) is true because doorbells produce sound energy when they ring. Option (A) is incorrect because lemons do not produce sound energy. Option (C) is incorrect because doorbells produce sound energy, not light energy. Option (D) is incorrect because lightbulbs produce light energy, not sound energy.

This question requires knowledge about the different types of energy and their corresponding objects. Lemons are not related to sound energy, as they do not produce sound. Doorbells, on the other hand, produce sound when they are rung, so (B) doorbells :: sound energy is a true relationship. Option (C) doorbells :: light energy is incorrect because doorbells do not produce light. Option (D) lightbulbs :: sound energy is also incorrect because light bulbs produce light, not sound.
